Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/Diversey
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Diversey, Central Park, Fullerton, and Pulaski near Pulaski/Diversey.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Diversey, Central Park, Fullerton, and Pulaski near Pulaski/Diversey.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between 35th-Bronzeville-IIT and 63rd Terminals (Cottage Grove and Ashland/63rd)
ShortDescription: Green Line srvc has been temporarily suspended btwn 35th-Bronzville-IIT and 63rd Terminals. Shuttle bus avail btwn 35th-Bronzeville IIT and 63rd Terminals.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between 35th-Bronzville-IIT and 63rd Terminals (Cottage Grove and Ashland/63rd) due to track switching problems.

As a result, trains are operating only between Harlem and 35th-Bronzeville-IIT at this time.

Consider using #3 King Drive, #4 Cottage Grove , #8 Halsted, #9 Ashland buses and or Red Line as alternative.

Shuttle bus available 35th-Bronzeville-IIT to 63rd Terminals. (Cottag Grove and Ashland/63rd)

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
